column4: hm, i got a strangest problem ever, im running commercial software on percise, CrossStudio, and when i run a program, it nor showing on unity dock, nor is it available in alt+tab list, any ideas?
seen that issue mentioned here with other apps. is this a java app  by any  chanve
no i dont think so it , im not sure what toolkit its using, but it souesn feel like java
i see that same issue mentioned in here befor. never seen a definituve fix. the forums or askubuntu.com may have some hits on the issue
